attributes.action: Abolish Children & Families Social Services Departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is a well known fact that social services do a lot more harm than good. They pick on the wrong people and they create problems where there arent any. 
The families that need help don't get it, they persecute a lot of people and they should not have so much power against normal people.
